Plot: Sent in by the BSAA, Chris Redfield has a new mission. It takes him into South Africa where he encounters a new horror and relives an old past.
Title: Resident Evil 5
Writer: Yoshiaki Hirabayashi (scenario), Haruo Murata (scenario), Tsukasa Takenaka (story), Kenichi Ueda (story)
Director: Liam O'Brien, Toshio Ohashi, Jim Sonzero, Garson Yu
Actors: Roger Craig Smith, Eva La Dare, D.C. Douglas, Patricia Ja Lee
